changeSet.author: CP
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `customer` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '', `first_name` VARCHAR(45) NULL COMMENT '', `last_name` VARCHAR(45) NULL COMMENT '', `mobile_number` VARCHAR(45) NULL COMMENT '', `email` VARCHAR(45) NULL COMMENT '', `password` VARCHAR(45) NULL COMMENT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) COMMENT '');
